title: Photoelectric - max v vs lambda and work function

content.question: Photons of wavelength <math alttext="lambda" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>λ</mi></math> strike the surface of a material that has a work function <math alttext="W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>W</mi></math>, causing electrons of mass <math alttext="m sub e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub></math> to be emitted from the surface. What is the maximum speed of the emitted electrons?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of, the fraction 2 over m sub e, end fraction, times, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator h lambda, and denominator c, end fraction, plus W, close parenthesis, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>h</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mi>c</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="the square root of, the fraction 2 over m sub e, end fraction, times, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator h lambda, and denominator c, end fraction, minus W, close parenthesis, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>h</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow><mi>c</mi></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="the square root of, the fraction 2 over m sub e, end fraction, times, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator h c, and denominator lambda, end fraction, plus W, close parenthesis, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>h</mi><mi>c</mi></mrow><mi>λ</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="the square root of, the fraction 2 over m sub e, end fraction, times, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator h c, and denominator lambda, end fraction, minus W, close parenthesis, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>h</mi><mi>c</mi></mrow><mi>λ</mi></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of, the fraction 2 over m sub e, end fraction, times, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator h c, and denominator lambda, end fraction, minus W, close parenthesis, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>h</mi><mi>c</mi></mrow><mi>λ</mi></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
